description: An adjustment line related to a single adjustment against a sales order entity (SOH, SOL).  Multiple adjustment lines are possible (1:*), thus this line object is typically in an array

AdjustmentId.description: The canonical (synthetic) Xfuze Adjustment ID, if identifiable, format Adjustment_[SourceSystem]_[Number] e.g Adjustment_D365_AD123456

AdjustmentNumber.description: The natural adjustment number / key, if identifiable e.g AD123456

AdjustmentCode.description: The unique code of the Adjustment e.g AD020

AdjustmentMethodType.description: The method type of the Adjustment e.g Automatic, Manual

AdjustmentPurpose.description: The purpose of the Adjustment e.g Correction, Goodwill

AdjustmentDesc.description: The description of the Adjustment instance

AdjustmentStatus.description: The collection of Status for this adjustment

AdjustmentTimes.description: The collection of key Time points for this adjustment

Totals.description: The collection of possible totals, related to the adjustment.  Actual usage and ability to populate depends on the richness of the sources..

GLCode.description: A GL code associated with this adjustment

ReasonCode.description: The reason code for this Adjustment

ReasonDesc.description: The reason desc for this Adjustment

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
